spell1.name: STRETCH PUNCH
spell1.description: Stretch out a forward punch to attack enemies.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Swinging your arms can attack multiple targets

spell2.name: BRAINIAC BOUNCE
spell2.description: Leap upward and smash the ground, slowing enemies within range. Can leap again upon landing a hit.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: After the minimum number of leaps, each additional leap must hit an enemy to trigger the next one

spell3.name: REFLEXIVE RUBBER
spell3.description: Stretch body to absorb damage before launching stored damage in the targeted direction.

spell4.name: FLEXIBLE ELONGATION
spell4.description: Gain a shield, select a target, and dash towards them, dealing damage to enemies and granting Shield to allies.

spell5.name: DISTENDED GRIP
spell5.description: Extend arms forward to entangle an enemy, then press  to pull the hit enemy toward you, or select and yank another enemy, knocking them airborne against each other.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Projectile that fires in a straight trajectory

spell6.name: ELASTIC STRENGTH
spell6.description: Using abilities generates Elasticity, boosting attack power. Reaching full Elasticity triggers an Inflated state that grants Shield and boosts even more damage.
